website_summaries.verdict: Smooths the hair with a minimal number of passes without snagging or breaking.
pros: Works as well as pricier brands
Floating plates auto adjust to hair thickness
cons: Can only adjust in 20-degree increments rather than more precise increments

customer_reviews.title: Love the digital display
customer_reviews.text: I did not like their flat iron with the dial because I can’t monitor the exact temperature. However the one with the digital display is excellent! Definitely worth spending the extra money on the Glider Elite model!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty101bylisa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem to create a silky seal like my other flat iron does
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to create a silky seal like my other flat iron does. My hair frizzes not too long after I use this flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: Ke Alohi

customer_reviews.title: Works well for international travel
customer_reviews.text: I read about this flat iron on a travel blog and bought it for a trip to Italy because it has dual voltage. In the past, I’ve used Chi straighteners and I currently have a L’ange that was very expensive and I didn’t want to risk damaging it. I was very pleased with this product. It heats up quickly, cord is nice and long, it came nicely packaged, and the quality is good. I could straighten and curl with ease. Will definitely continue to use this when I travel out of the country.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: This is better than my chi!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is better than my chi. Trust me I know my flat irons! My hair is silky smooth and feels amazing after I use this. The travel bag is fab too!
customer_reviews.author: Patti D

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Italy with the proper outlet converter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Italy since my other flat iron that cost twice as much would work there. This flat iron worked great and I like it so much I’m going to use it at home instead of my more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great value flat iron! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this flat iron! I was in need of one after the one I had had for years had a plate fall out! This one is light weight, heats up quickly and is the perfect size for me curl or straighten my hair! And for the price too I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Catt

customer_reviews.title: Love! Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love! Works great! Took 20 minutes to do my whole head which is fast for the amount of hair I have. Doesn't make your hair smell and feels soft and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked this flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked this flat iron, until it started to catch on fire this morning. I seem to be too far out to return the hot iron I bought just 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Possible fake
customer_reviews.text: I think this is fake. The voltage rating on the iron itself is different than on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Msobai

customer_reviews.title: Ok, while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: I was a fan of Chi straighteners for the longest time & I was hesitant to change but I was tired of the Chi's giving out after about a year. I have naturally curly/ frizzy hair & it's hard to find a straightener that works well for my hair. I read the reviews & decided to give this one a try. It was great & did as good if not better than Chi's had on my hair, but I bought this in January & after 6 months the straightener no longer gets hot enough to straighten my hair. For the price I wouldn't call this a major loss, as I do use my straighteners almost daily, but still disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: KIRSTIE JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: This does not get hot enough, I was not pleased with this product My next one I’ll get it from a beautition
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: First was faulty, second works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Original product received had a faulty temperature gauge that was stuck on the max and fried my hair. Received a replacement unit, which so far is working fantastic. Very happy with the service received and the fact that the company stood behind their product and made it right for the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Under New Management, yay!
customer_reviews.text: Update: under new management and they were so helpful. They sent me a new updated version with everything included. J didn’t have to do anything I haven’t tried the product itself yet to be honest but it’s annoying to be told things are included that are not really. It’s only a sample but the Afghan Oil leave in hair treatment is missing from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Best straightener I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this straightener for like 2 years now and I love it!! Works really good for my hair that has lots of fly aways
customer_reviews.author: Ritchelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Worst ever! A quality iron should need only 2 passes to straighten your hair. I turned it up to 450 and it took 6 to 10 passes per section. It didn’t even steam over a few damp pieces. Didn’t come with the free trial of oil either.
customer_reviews.author: Jenm

customer_reviews.title: Great straightener- just not for high humidity areas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this straightener for a work trip to Amsterdam. I needed a straightener that I could use with my converter. The straightener works well and the only reason I did not rate it 5 stars was due to how well it works in high humidity areas. For my trip it was fine as the heat and humidity were nothing like it is in the Alabama where I live. I have used the product since being home a few times and with the humidity here it just doesn’t compare to my Chi. Overall though, I am very pleased with the product and my purchase! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired hairdresser I needed a new flat iron did some looking online and decided to give this one a try. I can't say enough of about this iron it is an awesome tool. The price was very affordable works just as well as the very expensive tools I would buy when I was working. Love it would buy it again. As to the free sample that was included i loved it. I have purchased the spray in heat treatment and love it as well. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: VieVie

customer_reviews.title: It smells like a porta potty
customer_reviews.text: Within a minute of turning it on my bathroom legitimately started smelling like a Porta potty. When I turned it off the smell started fading. I’ve tried it multiple times in multiple places and it always stinks up the entire room. It’s a vomit-inducing level bad smell. I have no clue what is wrong with it and have NEVER experienced a flat iron that smells before. I’m too grossed out to try to use it on my hair. Terrible terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I’m really liking this flat iron so far. It seems to be easier on my hair than the last one I owned. It doesn’t pull or dry out my hair, which is very important when using appliances that put out a certain amount of heat. I don’t tend to completely straighten my hair anymore these days, but mostly to control the direction my wavy hair lays, cause it tends to flip up in weird places.
customer_reviews.author: C. Prejean

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I hadn’t bought this product. I had the cheaper version that worked fine and lasted me a few years. I thought I’d upgrade to the nicer one but I’m sorry I did. Cons: Knob gives highest and lowest temp but that’s it. Takes several passes over hair to straighten. Temp is never quite right. Knob moves a lot so the temperature is never exactly what you want. Pros: This product heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality has made me very pleased with my chioice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this flat iron. It leaves my hair smooth and shiny and and the strands glide through the iron without sticking or pulling on my hair. It also does not leave my hair ends feeling dry, as other irons have. It is comfortable to use and feels substantial without being too heavy. The size is perfect for me-not too small, or too big for travel-and the travel sack is well made too and a nice addition. I am clearly very pleased with my choice..;)
customer_reviews.author: Marny Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The straightener works better than I imagined! It heats up super fast and straightens my hair perfectly. I am biracial (half African American) and was unsure if this could really straighten my hair, but it does and it makes it extremely shiny. Also, unlike other hair straighteners this one does not snag on my hair causing breakage!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Prefect CHI Dupe, Maybe Better
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron is a straight up dupe for the CHI irons. I had a CHI flat iron that lasted me a decade and when it died I just couldn't see spending $100 plus on a new one, so I got this iron and I have but regretted it at all. Super long cord, great even heat, smooth plates, everything you need in a flat iron. If you have been searching for a good flat iron search no more. This is the flat iron you need!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell how good it is comment looked used and returning.
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic plates, had a couple chips in it. HSI on each side I open and close, the gold looks old and lets me believe it's used.
customer_reviews.author: Rudd, S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flat iron I’ve ever tried. I no longer have to go to the beauty salon to have my hair straightened. My hair maintains its shine even in cloudy and humid weather. I use it once after washing my hair. I style my hair, then the rest of the week, just brush my hair out. It still looks good and shiny a week later.
customer_reviews.author: MILLIE68

customer_reviews.title: and my hair stylist said that HSI is a good brand. It received good reviews on line so ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the deal offered on Amazon, and my hair stylist said that HSI is a good brand. It received good reviews on line so I purchased it. It arrived on time. I liked that it had the red and green temp indicator light, and it seemed to hold the temp very well. I had read that this might be an issue, but did not find it to be a problem. Upon trying it, I found it to have a good grip. The only thing I didn't like about it is that it wasn't as smooth as I had expected when going through my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not terrible. But plates don't fully close/clamp together
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed given all the glowing reviews. On the plus side, the plates are quite smooth and the iron heats up quickly. However, the plates don't actually clamp tightly together all the way down - with a gap between the lower 50% or so of the plates. It is maddening to have to nudge my hair with my other hand to the upper half of the plates with every pass. It works just fine. That's it. No better than my cheap Conair model.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Better and Improved - updated review
customer_reviews.text: They have made improvements to this flatiron. Now instead of a knob, you get a digital display w/buttons which make adjusting the heater easier and better than frying your hair. The hair treatment that comes with it is awesome and they have added auto shut off, HUGE plus! The only reason I did not give it a 5-star is that the buttons can be hard to get to if you have larger hands. The location is great since you don't chance cutting it off by accidentally hitting the buttons, but the spread of the iron might need to be slightly larger so that hands can get to the buttons with ease. I would purchase this again with the improvements!
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire151

customer_reviews.title: Good Ceramic Iron
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. It straightens hair in no time and it's light and durable. I have to say that I've purchased this product several times. In the past the management was not good now it has improved significantly. But it! You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Perry

customer_reviews.title: Straightens 4c Hair! But use a heat protection serum!
customer_reviews.text: Straightened my 4c Natural hair with the help of a wonderful heat protection serum that keeps hair moisturized and keeps it from frizzing. 4c hair is the true test of a flat iron. Lol I used ORC Heat Protection Serum for $7. That $15 HSI heat protection spray was crap! It straightened my hair but put a gross "film" on my hair and made it break off.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Really want to do love
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product after reading such wonderful reviews. Unfortunately once I got the item delivered and opened the box it seems as if there was a short with in the electrical unit of the straightener every time I turned it on it started to sizzle and crackle even sparked at me one time. I immediately re-boxed in return for refund and purchased a different one altogether
customer_reviews.author: SmjOrtiz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Gets hot fast! Hair is not super curly but I do have frizz and wavy hair. I personally love pin straight hair. I set this on the highest heat setting and get the silkiest hair I've ever had really quick, with one drag. After a few months of on and off use I still have zero split ends ;)
customer_reviews.author: TriSaraht0ps

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the hope that I could straighten my daughter’s hair faster. Well it does heat up well but I find that you have to take very thin and small sections to get a better result. This is very time consuming and it still leaves waves and frizz. My daughter’s hair is thick but I have a straightener from Costco that works better than this one. Also I’ve had this digital HSI straightener for about 45 days and now when you turn it on it sounds like it’s going to short out. Maybe the dial version of this works better.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 4

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. Wouldn't recommend for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without the oil and rough white chips on both plates. Contacted seller with no response. Really hard to see accurate temp with just a dial. Prefer digital read out. Received a replacement from Amazon and this time oil was included and plates weren't chipped. Not the greatest but only bought for overseas travel. I wouldn't use this as my primary flat iron. Unimpressed so far. Heading to tjmaxx to see if I can find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Colsca

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs an auto shutoff
customer_reviews.text: the wife likes this iron but it lacks an auto shut-off and since she's used irons an auto shut-off it off and stays on all day long. I believe HSI makes models with an auto shut-off, so spend a little more and get one of those so you don't burn down your house!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Love this straightener but disappointed with delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightener so much that after 3 years of using my old one I bought a new one from the exact same company and model. I’m at however a little disappointed that the listing said it comes with a travel sized hair treatment and mine did not have it :( I was looking forward to trying that product so I could possibly buy the oil in the future....
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace my 10 year old straightener which was on it's way out. Sadly I found my 10 year old straightener does a better job than this brand new one. I have to run my hair through the HSI straightener at least 3 times before getting the smooth, straight look. Not impressed. I will be going back to the old.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: i purchased this item because of all the good reviews. I found it to be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this item because of all the good reviews. I found it to be a little heavier than I’d prefer and it did not smooth my hair as well as other irons i have had. In comparison to some cheaper ones i had it did okay, I just wasn’t satisfied enough to keep it and i am returning it. I am going to purchase a more expensive one at my local hair product store.
customer_reviews.author: ZW

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flat iron because it appeared to be similar to one that I currently have, FHI Heat. So far I've used this flat iron twice since I purchased it. On my first use I wasn't impressed. I didn't love it, but I didn't hate it either. The sides of the flat iron pulled at my hair. I also found that I had to use a high heat setting to get my desired results. I found this odd because my hair isn't coarse my any means. I am natural and have been for about 4-5 years so I assume this attribute to why I had to use a high heat setting. Otherwise I'm a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: I had the original version of this iron and loved it more than my Chi. When it died I thought I'd try this one, seemingly better for my hair. It doesn't do as well of a job as the original but a good enough job to keep vs. return. Get the one with 30k reviews. It has electronic temp control.
customer_reviews.author: Alli S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Does not do a good job at all, even after going over section of hair numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love my new flat iron!
customer_reviews.text: This iron replaced my Babyliss that finally crapped out after 15 yrs (?). I was hesitant to buy something else than a Babyliss to replace my old one, but after reading the reviews decided to go with the HSI. Very happy I did, as this iron works great on my fine thick hair. Price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good at catching my roots.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good straightener. I went from having to pass a straightener through my hair 4-5 times when straightening to only twice. I’m Africa’s American and do not use relaxer. So that’s a lot of time saved when doing/ washing my hair. Very good at catching my roots.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest. I returned after one use. It heated up well, but didnt hold the heat. After 2 swipes of my hair, the light came back on and I had to wait for it to heat back up again. Not sure if it was defective or if that's how this flat iron operates, but I dont have that kind of time when styling my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dee83

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for hair iron
customer_reviews.text: Really good straitening iron. My hair gets a "done" look in around 6 minutes. Its easy to use, and doesn't burn your hands. The swivel cord is excellent. The iron feels sturdy. It came in beautiful packaging too! If your looking for a sensible straightening iron, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Sensible

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flat iron. My chi died and I replaced it with a baby bliss but I wasn't impressed. I already have one of these that I kept as a backup up at my boyfriend's house and I just decided that it was so good that I would make it my main flat iron so now I have two.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: You have a knob to "guess" how high or low it is. I was very unhappy compared to my Chi
customer_reviews.text: Temp control????? You have to guess. I thought I'd be replacing my Chi because I needed a new straightener but OHHHH NO! I sent it back and got another Chi that works much better and tells me what temperature I have it set on digitally.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... this for about 6 months now and it works great. Heats up fast and smooths and straightens my ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 6 months now and it works great. Heats up fast and smooths and straightens my hair quickly. I have thick curly/frizzy hair and this makes it bone straight. Glad I purchased this straightener. I've even dropped it a bunch of times and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: A.Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FLAT IRON OUT THERE!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write product reviews, but I had to tell people about the HSI Professional Flat Iron. I have brought and tried so many flat irons in my time, but this one is THE BEST! Most of the flat irons out there will leave your hair smelling like its burnt. I am a African American female who has thick wavy hair. This flat iron, with the argon oil makes my hair straight and shiny, and it looks and feels amazing. If you are in the market for a good flat iron that is reasonably priced, you can not go wrong with this one. I highly reccommand it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best flat ion ever.
customer_reviews.text: I received my flat iron today. I have been using the flat iron since I opened the package. It is by far the best flat iron I used. I used it to curl and flat iron my wigs. My wigs look like I just stepped out of a hair salon.
customer_reviews.author: angell

customer_reviews.title: Not As Impressive As I Assumed
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this hair straightener but it wasn't as impressive as I had hoped. I have an almost 6 year old Korean brand professional flat iron that outperforms this brand new one. I had to really crank up the heat to get good results. For some reason the plates on this flat iron makes my hair super static which is beyond annoying. I do like this flat iron for getting to the hair near the ears or doing my fringe but I'll probably only use it for that or traveling. The Argan oil sample was nice but super tiny. The carrying bag and heat glove were a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Humes

customer_reviews.title: NO SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working within 2 weeks of opening the package at Christmas. They NEVER responded to requests for repair or replacement under warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bought it twice it’s great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this hair straightener. The last one I bought was 5 years ago. I am pleased it is still around. Totally worth the money- both times. The price is amazing- I recommend this to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Rae&Mario

customer_reviews.title: I never knew healthy looking hair was possible!
customer_reviews.text: I love this straightner. I have wavy, coarse, frizzy, and very color damaged. Over the years I just surrendered to my hair, thinking "I'll just never have pretty hair again". I've always used a Chi flat iron and I thought I was happy with it until I tried this iron. I know realize the Chi was my main problem! It left my hair lifeless and dull. After just one use, this straightner has transformed my hair. For the first time in years my hair looks healthy again! I wish I found this flat iron about 15 years ago. Bottom line, I highly recommend this flat iron!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Man lol this thing is ok it isn’t on a chi level or on like a silk steamer level
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these flat irons for my exchange students who had little to no experience with heat styling. We found these flat irons easy to use, heat up quickly and the glove is very helpful. The girls have gotten very good at curling and straightening their hair with the flat iron. Now they are using the irons in Europe without a problem. I was surprised at the quality for such an affordable price. My favorite feature is the adjustable temp, because lower heat is so much better for fine hair. Some of the more expensive irons do not allow for adjustable heat and will end up frying your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Marie Inman

customer_reviews.title: The HSI professional straighner is one of the best I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have used many hair straightners. Some I have paid a lot of money for. The HSI professional straighner is one of the best I have used. The only feature I can say I do not like is there is no automatic off switch. I am sure this is because it is a professional tool and most professionals use their products throughout the day and do not want them to turn off. The straightner did pull my hair when I first started using it, but once it was broke in, it no longer pulled. I would recommend using some type of straighning cream so it doesn't pull.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pulling
customer_reviews.text: It heats up well, but the plates are about an inch shorter then my previous straightener which I didn't think would be a problem but it makes it more likely that my hair gets caught in the seam between the plate and the rest of the straightener. It is an awful lot of pulling that I never experienced before with my old straightener, so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I have very straight, fine hair, I used a curling iron for years for more volume. I saw you tube video how to curl your hair with a flat iron so I decided to try. I love it, this flat iron can straighten your hair or curl it. The temperature control is perfect, it heats up quickly and I spend less time doing my hair with the flat iron and my hair looks good. I have tried other (cheaper) irons in the past but this one is super nice. You are getting a great iron for the price.
customer_reviews.author: traci balusik

customer_reviews.title: I got it because of the good reviews, but I have more split ends than ...
customer_reviews.text: It is burning my hair! I got it because of the good reviews, but I have more split ends than ever before and I am not able to get a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Girlet Romero

customer_reviews.title: Check your iron to make sure it matches the picture on the box.
customer_reviews.text: I received my HSI and first of all it didn’t look like the picture on the box, it looked used, and it would not stay on, as if there was a short on the cord. I received a replacement and it looked just like the picture on the box and works. Be careful you aren’t sent a used iron. The company was quick to send me a replacement but this shouldn’t have happened. My husband bought me this for my birthday and he felt so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not glide as smoothly as hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Smooths my hair fine, but unable to curl with it effectively
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Ford

customer_reviews.title: smooth
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has thick hair almost to her waist. I HATED her straightening her hair because of the pull and rip of the ones she's used before. This one- excellent! Beyond happy! I did A LOT of research, because I love her hair and don't want it ruined. Happy with my pick. No worry about the product catching on fire (like other reviews have said about other straighteners- holy crap!! ) Arrives in a nice box and a pretty bag, too. Her hair dresser said "your hair is your diamond". My daughters hair is shiny, straight and smooth- a pretty diamond.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flat iron based on reviews from Amazon as well as a Facebook friend. Actually, all the girls made comments on Facebook about how nice this iron worked to both straighten and curl their hair. It works very well. My hair is never burned, and I can easily add a few curls if I'm in the mood. The temperature gauge works well as sometimes I want it cooler and/or hotter depending on what I'm doing with my hair that day. I worry about frizzy and dry looking hair as I'm an older gal! Great flat iron especially for the money! Gosh, I've spent tons of money on flat irons!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Menard

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable straightener
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have nothing negative to truly say. It’s a great straightener for its price and I have wavy thick hair. It comes with a nice heat protection glove, but I personally don’t use it. You can tell however that it isn’t a expensive straightener and could preform just a little better/nicer.
customer_reviews.author: CalSmith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results!
customer_reviews.text: I love the settings and different temperatures options, great to use on natural hair as well as my human hair and synthetic wigs inventory!
customer_reviews.author: Gigiperry

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing, does the job BUT not exact heat control
customer_reviews.text: The way the hair slides between the plates is amazing! No tugging or pulling. I have used this to both straighten and curl my hair with no uncomfortable pinching. CON: there is no exact heat measurement. It is simply a dial, the heat ranging from high to low. I would have liked to managed the temperature exactly to save frying my hair. It's a mild inconvenience, the reason I gave it 4-stars vs 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleighh92

customer_reviews.title: You need and want this iron
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this little iron was quite a surprise to me. I thought I preferred a larger iron plate, but this iron styled my hair so much faster. My hair is medium thick and tends to hold moisture. Sleeping in wet hair, the next morning, looking like a sheep dog, I had my hair smoothed is less than 20 minutes. It heats up quickly and product can be used with it. You simply can't miss if u're looking for a straight iron. I wasn't, personally, but got talked into purchasing it. It's amazing such a little thing as an iron can make such a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Got It

customer_reviews.title: Not anything exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I bought in April 2018 and the straightener was good for the first few months. However, over the last several months it has not been heating consistently. I turn it on and wait for it to heat up (red lights turns green) but it loses heat after just a couple passes. The light only stays green for ten seconds at a time then the lack of heat causes my hair to get super static-y. It was decent while it lasted, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a basic Department store brand flat iron that cost $20 or less for some time. It works but leaves my hair dry and brittle because of the inconsistent heating on the NOT ceramic plates. I couldn't afford a high end flat iron so starting reading some of the reviews and everyone seemed to be quite pleased with the HSI flat iron, so thought I would give it a try. I love it. It leaves my hair flat, smooth and very shiny. Very pleased with my purchase. When I am ready to purchase a curling iron, I will definitely be getting and HSI curling iron.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Temperature settings not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The heat settings are not accurate and at 450 degrees I felt I was only getting heat results in low 300’s compared to another iron. It’s trial and error with this iron unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Flat iron is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Flat iron is easy to use. Heats up quickly and stays hot throughout use. Easy grip and cord is on a swivel which allows for twisting of the iron without the cord getting in the way. I love to use this iron to curl my hair. Able to straighten and curl my hair at the same time. Also the oil (Argan) leaves hair feeling soft and healthy. Usually I put the oil in (just a dime size) throughout my hair before flat ironing or curling. It helps to prevent burning and drying and hair. It also helps to hold the curl longer. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Clamps don’t touch all the way when pressed
customer_reviews.text: Heat control and rounded edges are great and all or “versatile” as amazon described to me, but this iron doesn’t clamp all the way, so won’t work for my thin asian hair. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: I've used Chi flat irons at the recommendation of my hair stylist for years. Recently my Chi died and I began to shop around. I came across this HSI flat iron and decided to give it a shot. I'm multiracial with curly hair and I've used this HSI flat iron 5 times now and each time I've been impressed. The green like indicator is handy and I really like having the ability to control the temperature setting on this flat iron too. I highly recommend this product!''
customer_reviews.author: Elle S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong model shipped
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this model Brand Name HSI PROFESSIONAL Model Info 3rdGenoriginal Item model number 3rdGenoriginal Part Number e383r Adjustable temperature from 240f to 410f But we got an older model Adjustable temp from 140f to 450f Model e038 HSI should correct the miss leading information in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Simo Raftani

customer_reviews.title: No auto shut-off.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I just wished it had an auto shut-off feature, as I’m always forgetting to turn mine off. I ended up returning it for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R.

customer_reviews.title: ... I have to say this is one of the best I've had
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of flat irons through the years and I have to say this is one of the best I've had. It does not burn your hair which was a big problem with my previous iron. Even if I've put product in my hair it does not sizzle. Also, I can use less strokes with the plates straightening my hair swift. The only complaint is that it does not have a auto turn off.I've caught myself a couple times having left it on but I have it on a heat mat so it has some protection. All in all it is an excellent flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this straightener. I have fine hair and have had problems with other straighteners pulling my hair and my hair not staying straight all day. This one glides right through my hair and straightens it very nicely and my hair is staying straight all day long. The pouch that is included is very well made and will protect the straightener when not in use or while traveling. It also came with a glove and a travel size container of Argon oil. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Pearson

customer_reviews.title: HSI Pro Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: Works great, leaves my hair soft and frizz free. I don't feel it pulling my hair like my previous flat iron. The pouch that came with it is really nice. It also came with a sample size bottle of Argan oil which makes my hair so soft. I was pleasantly surprised with everything, from super fast shipping, to how well it works. For only $40, this was a very good buy. Update: I've had this flat iron for a while now. Still works good, still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: calimom

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Condition your hair ends.
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. Love the swivel cord, no twisted messy cord. It came with its own hot sheild storage and a Velcro strap to wrap up the cord. As with any heated hair appliance: use care. Condition and use hair heat protection hair cream before and after use. I like the argon or carrot based hair oil and then John Frieda Touch-up finishing cream after styling.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Unable to determine how hot it is and no auto shut off
customer_reviews.text: I had a prior version of this flat iron and loved it. This one does the job, however I have no idea what the heat is set to because it has a very small knob with no setting between the lowest and highest. This also doesn't have automatic shut off like the other ones. At this point I am looking to buy a new one because of these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item great price
customer_reviews.text: Great hair Straightener! The price is great for what you get. This was my second one in 6 years. My first one lasted me that long. I seen all this hype about the babyliss pro Straightener so I bought it a while back. I ended up returning it because it wasnt as good as my hsi hair Straightener and was more than half of the cost. No complaints on this item. Purchase it you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good straightener
customer_reviews.text: The flat iron does a really great job straightening my daughter's curly hair. I don't have to touch it up daily, thr style seems to be able to withstand humidity. The only downside is that it only seems to straighten on the highest heat setting, which may cause heat damage over time.
customer_reviews.author: smith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at 3/4 turn of temp dial
customer_reviews.text: Didnot work on 1/2 turn of temp dial but did on 3/4 or max temp on dial. Never had a straightener before. This did the job intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mybuy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. I bought to use in Italy as we were traveling to Europe and needed a straightener that I could use in their outlets. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: samantha mallay

customer_reviews.title: Tourmaline plates are the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: My prior straightener was titanium plates and expensive. It recently broke so I did some research and learned tourmaline was much safer for your hair. I thought it would just lesson the effects of damage however first use I notice my hair just looked shinier and healthy when straightened. Verses before the ends would look a bit dry after straightening. I have even received many complements recently on my hair. Only change is the straightener. I definitely recommend the straightener.
customer_reviews.author: ALI

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: This gets pretty hot, you can control the temperature with a little dial. But it doesn't feel heavy enough in my hand. Like I have to really clamp down in order to get a good grip when straightening or curling with it. Also, it does take a few swipes to get my hair straight or curly enough. I can cause some frizz, so use a serum or something. Not bad for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It is her first flat iron and it seems to work wonderfully. We have flat ironed her hair with it ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this flat iron for her 12th birthday. It is her first flat iron and it seems to work wonderfully. We have flat ironed her hair with it and curled it. Both worked great. It seems to be equal quality to an iron that her older cousin bought for at least double the amount if not more. My daughter's hair is fairly straight already and isn't very thick. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flat iron
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use in the camper. She liked it so much, she kept it in the house for every day use. She said it's the best flat iron she had used.
customer_reviews.author: wadkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Straightner for Picky Teens (or anyone else)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flat iron for my very picky 14 year old daughter as a gift for Christmas (she's got thick, really long hair, almost down to her butt!) and she absolutely LOVES it. It gets her hair nice and stick straight and it looks really lovely - hah, makes me a bit jealous of her gorgeous hair! Anyhow, I would definitely recommend this product, like I said, the girl is picky as heck (makes buying gifts pretty difficult) but if she loves it that much, you are guaranteed to love it too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzylicious

customer_reviews.title: Not working after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months. It heats up initially but as soon as I use it on a couple sections of hair, it stops hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my daughter so it hasn't been used yet. But it arrived quickly. I think she'll love it! Update 07/16: This was a great purchase! I bought it as a gift for my daughter. She uses it nearly every day. I spent all my birthday money on a Chi iron last year--and this HSI works as well or better! I wish I would have found this iron before spending all that money! This iron works great and the price is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The straightening iron works just as good and I would say even better then $150 version you'll have to pay to buy CHI brand. A little hesitant at first, but my gamble certainly paid off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: It's "ok" but really nothing to write home about. Temp control varies and I have super thick curly hair so it always takes longer to flat iron it. It's good for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for international travels.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always traveled internationally with my “Chi” flatiron. It’s has always sparked and I’ve had to replace it after some vacations. Therefore, this time I decided to buy a flatiron that can convert to other voltages. This was perfect. It did not spark and it heated up quickly and it was a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: Powell Mom

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BUY FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second HSI flat iron. However, I don't use it to straighten my hair, I use it to curl my short hair and it works just perfectly. The only reason I had to purchase a second one is that I accidently dropped the first one, that I had for almost three years, in the bathtub! I highly recommend this product for it's temperature control and other user friendly features. The only con is that it doesn't cut off automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Gammy

customer_reviews.title: It works but...
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron! Straightens my thick waves/curls quickly. But... it came to me with the coating on the plates damaged. Two spots were scratched off when I opened the box. I didn’t return because on the product page it says “product unavailable” so I didn’t want to bother. Hopefully more of the coating doesn’t come off!
customer_reviews.author: Winston Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best straightener I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this straightener. I have shoulder length fine hair that tends to get frizzy on the ends and has been very hard to straighten with other straighteners (and I have used more expensive, supposedly salon quality straighteners). It only takes one pass over my hair to get smooth hair. This straightener is not too big or bulky and fits perfectly in my hand. It truly gives salon quality results at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzysj

customer_reviews.title: A good deal at a good price
customer_reviews.text: The HSI flat iron works as well as the expensive flat iron I was using. Plus, the HSI has temperature control. There was a problem with the first one I received but the HSI company is great to work with and promptly took care of the problem. You also get a very nice travel bag for the flat iron and a bottle of argan oil as well as a glove to wear if you're like me and burn yourself. This is a good deal at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were some of the best overall flat irons but I was proven WRONG. These are trash honestly & bulky
customer_reviews.author: Alayisa

product_meta.title: HSI Professional Ceramic Tourmaline Ionic Flat Iron, With Travel Size Argan Oil Leave In Hair Treatment, Worldwide Dual Voltage 110v-220v
product_meta.description: Hair trends may come and go, but the straight shiny hair will never go out of fashion. For the women who are addicted to perfectly sleek hair, the flat iron is an irreplaceable beauty accessory. That is why hsi professional created the versatile, must-have flat iron which instantly transforms your dull frizzy mane into a cover girl straight hair. The flat iron boasts a revolutionary ceramic ionic system for guaranteed hydrated and shiny hair, combined with a smart infrared technology which acts in depth, giving you sleek hair with an attitude. This dual voltage worldwide edition has 100 percent solid ceramic tourmaline plates that protect the hair, giving it extra-shine, and its curved round edges will help you straighten, flip or curl your hair, salon-style. The adjustable temperature can go up to 450f and the 360 swivel cord, plus the ergonomic design will make this experience fun and easy. Even the girls with the most stubborn types of hair can now say good-bye to annoying frizz. It's sleek time.
feature_bullets: Floating plates: auto adjusts to your hair thickness and type
100 percent true ceramic tourmaline plates and advanced infrared heat technology
Flip and curl: round body shape design allows unique flips and curling styles
Includes 5 ml Argan oil leave in conditioner bottle, worldwide dual voltage 110v-220v

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
